post.description: Submit a document to this endpoint, which will categorize it into the correct document type. It then returns the document split into its respective type and provides the extracted key-value pairs of essential information for each categorized document.

DocumentAnalyze.title: DocumentAnalyze

oneOf.title: File
oneOf.description: Submit a document file directly for analysis. Provide the file as a binary string.

file.title: File
file.description: The document file to be analyzed, provided as a binary string.

oneOf.title: Url
oneOf.description: Submit a URL pointing to the document to be analyzed. Provide the URL as a valid URI string.

url.title: Url
url.description: The URL of the document to be analyzed.

DocumentAnalyze.description: Submit either a document file or a URL to the document for analysis. The endpoint will handle the document based on the provided input, either directly from the file or by fetching it from the provided URL.

DocumentAnalyzeResponse.title: DocumentAnalyzeResponse

document_type.description: The type of document determined by the categorization process.

pages.description: The pages that have been identified for this document type.

split.description: Details of how the document has been split into its respective type and the associated pages.

extracted.description: The key-value pairs of essential information extracted from the document.

items.description: An array of objects representing the split documents and their extracted information.

DocumentAnalyzeResponse.description: The JSON response format for each document type can be referenced [here](../../../endpoints/document/types/bill-of-lading). By using this endpoint, you can efficiently manage and process multiple documents, obtaining structured and relevant information from them.
